pageContent: Background: The Danish Cancer Registry (DCR) is the oldest nationwide population-based cancer registry in the Nordic countries. At the time of the study the DCR recorded date of diagnosis, tumor stage and initial treatment. The validity of the clinical information reported to the DCR has never been analyzed.

metaData.source:
A prospective report of changes in prostate cancer related quality of life after robotic prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21391068/
